SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists

Class PeList

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists.PeList
public class PeList extends Object
PeList is a collection of operations on lists of PEs.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov

  • Method Details

    • getById

      public static <T extends Pe> Pe getById(List<T> peList, int id)
      Gets a Pe with a given id.
      Parameters:
      peList - the PE list where to get a given PE
      id - the id of the PE to be get
      Returns:
      the PE with the given id or null if not found
      Precondition:
      id >= 0
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • getMips

      public static <T extends Pe> int getMips(List<T> peList, int id)
      Gets MIPS Rating of a PE with a given ID.
      Parameters:
      peList - the PE list where to get a given PE
      id - the id of the PE to be get
      Returns:
      the MIPS rating of the PE or -1 if the PE was not found
      Precondition:
      id >= 0
      Postcondition:
      $none

      public static <T extends Pe> double getMaxUtilizationAmongVmsPes(List<T> peList, Vm vm)
      Gets the max utilization percentage among all PEs allocated to a VM.
      Parameters:
      peList - the pe list
      vm - the vm to get the maximum utilization percentage
      Returns:
      the max utilization percentage

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the first free PE or null if not found
      Precondition:
      $none

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      number of free PEs
      Precondition:
      $none
      Postcondition:
      $result >= 0

    • setPeStatus

      public static <T extends Pe> boolean setPeStatus(List<T> peList, int id, int status)
      Sets a PE status.
      Parameters:
      peList - the PE list
      id - the id of the PE to be set
      status - the PE status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      Returns:
      true if the PE status has been changed, false otherwise (PE id might not be exist)
      Precondition:
      peID >= 0
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • getNumberOfBusyPes

      public static <T extends Pe> int getNumberOfBusyPes(List<T> peList)
      Gets the number of BUSY PEs.
      Parameters:
      peList - the PE list
      Returns:
      number of busy PEs
      Precondition:
      $none
      Postcondition:
      $result >= 0

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed(List<T> peList, String resName, int hostId, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of a host to FAILED or FREE. NOTE: resName and hostId are used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use
      invalid reference 
      #setStatusFailed(boolean)
      if you do not want this information.
      Parameters:
      peList - the host's PE list to be set as failed or free
      resName - the name of the resource
      hostId - the id of the host
      failed - true if the host's PEs have to be set as FAILED, false if they have to be set as FREE.
      See Also:
      • setStatusFailed(java.util.List, boolean)

    • setStatusFailed

      public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed(List<T> peList, boolean failed)
      Sets the status of PEs of a host to FAILED or FREE.
      Parameters:
      peList - the host's PE list to be set as failed or free
      failed - true if the host's PEs have to be set as FAILED, false if they have to be set as FREE.
